mapper.insert: INSERT INTO certificates (user_no, doctor_no, certificate_type, disease, content, outbreak_at, treatment_at, create_at, valid_until, status) VALUES (#{userNo}, #{doctorNo}, #{certificateType}, #{disease}, #{content}, #{outbreakAt}, #{treatmentAt}, #{createAt}, #{validUntil}, #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT u.user_name, u.user_rrn, u.user_add, u.user_add2, u.phone, r.diagnosis, r.outbreak_at, r.visit_at, c.content, c.note, c.purpose, d.user_name AS doctor_name, h.room_type, h.seat_no, h.disease_name, h.start_date, h.due_date, h.end_date, md.department_name FROM certificates c JOIN users u ON c.user_no = u.user_no JOIN medical_records r ON u.user_no = r.user_no JOIN users d ON c.doctor_no = d.user_no JOIN hospitalization h ON u.user_no = h.user_no JOIN medical_department md ON h.department_no = md.department_no WHERE c.certificate_id = #{certificateId}
